Synopsis:
"To Rome with Love ', the new film by Woody Allen, is the story of a group of people in Italy, some Americans, some Italians, some residents, other visitors, and romances, adventures and entanglements in which they are involved . The film puts us in touch with a renowned American architect reliving his youth with an ordinary middle-class Roman who suddenly finds himself the biggest celebrity of Rome, with a young couple having romantic encounters provincial separately and with a American opera director making every effort to bring to the stage a mortician who sings.
